text: Konstantin Gertig (born 2 February 2004) is a German professional footballer. He plays as forward for Austrian Second League club Liefering. He also played for the FC Salzburg squad in the UEFA Youth League 2021-22 and the U18 team of the Red Bull Academy.profile Konstantin Gertig ==Club career== He started in the youth of FC Red Bull Salzburg. 2018 he went to the FC Bayern MÃ¼nchen Academy where he played in the U16, U17 and U19 teams. 2021 he went back to Salzburg. In April 2022 he debuted for FC Liefering when he was in the starting team versus SV Lafnitz. ==References== Category:2004 births Category:Living people Category:German footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:FC Liefering players
title: Konstantin Gertig
